name: The Problem Forest
description:
The Story:

After working non stop for all of your life you decide that this isn't what you want in your life. When you sleep that night something  weird happens.....

Find out the meaning of the dream!

SPOILERS:

Walking through a forest the player comes across a weird looking monster, scared and frightened the player starts to run through the forest. Jumping over rocks and climbing trees you see a treehouse . Thinking you'll be safe there you see the monster all ready walking around. Picking up a large stick you found you start to attack the monster. 

When defeated you walk away and name the monster. You also  feel lighter, like a weight has been lifted off of your shoulders. 

When you wake up you decide that you can run from your problems you have to defeat them.
